title: SPARK-581533: [TOTVS S.A.] 2500+ 504 Gateway Timeout since migrating from REST API to GraphQL when executing queries.
long_summary: [Investigating] TOTVS S.A. is experiencing 2500+ 504 Gateway Timeout errors after migrating from REST API to GraphQL, impacting automated workflows and causing failed queries/mutations. Although backend API calls eventually succeed, extended response times (>10 minutes) trigger 504 errors, leading to incorrect host status in customer automation scripts. Multiple clusters are affected. Priority is P1; root cause appears to be cluster overload post-migration. Mitigation options and alternative status polling are being discussed.
action_items: Propose alternative response code to avoid automation script failures
Share polling workaround using queryHost API with customer

title: SPARK-551265: The registered hosts are not getting synced immediately in RSC when spray server timeouts
long_summary: [To Do] Bulk host registrations (~50) are not immediately synced in RSC UI when spray server timeouts prevent cdm rest service post-processing. Hosts eventually appear, but risk of missed updates exists. Fix needed on cdm side to trigger rest service before timeout. Priority P2; awaiting action.
action_items: Implement early failure in cdm API to trigger rest service before timeout
Verify if missed updates occur during bulk host registration

title: SPARK-519855: RBS deployment from RSC UI
long_summary: [Rollout] Automating RBS deployment from the RSC UI to eliminate manual installation steps for SQL hosts. High-priority Epic currently in rollout phase, with testing underway on 50 hosts. ATL review is required and in progress. This enhancement aims to streamline large-scale SQL host registration and reduce operational overhead.
action_items: Confirm ETA for ATL review with responsible stakeholders
Document results from 50-host testing in project tracker
